meanings.sent1: The toad had a warty skin.
meanings.sent2: Her hands felt rough and warty to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The witch's potion turned the prince's smooth skin warty!
meanings.sent4: The old tree bark was warty, like a toad's back.
meanings.sent5: The warty texture of the rock made it easy to grip.

meanings.sent1: The growth on the plant was warty in appearance.
meanings.sent2: The bumpy surface of the gourd looked warty.
meanings.sent3: The warty design on the vase gave it a unique charm.
meanings.sent4: The moon's surface appeared warty through the telescope.
meanings.sent5: The warty pattern on the fabric added a playful touch.

meanings.sent1: The frog was warty all over its body.
meanings.sent2: Her feet were warty from walking barefoot.
meanings.sent3: The warty pumpkin made the perfect Halloween decoration.
meanings.sent4: The warty toad stared at us with its bulging eyes.
meanings.sent5: The warty growths on the tree trunk looked like tiny mushrooms.
